name: Reverse Proxy
description: Spin up a reverse proxy quickly on Heroku

UPSTREAM_SERVER.description: URL of upstream server to which all requests should be proxied. eg: https://192.168.0.1

REDIRECT_TO.description: Redirect not allowed requests. eg: https://www.heroku.com

HTTP_EXTRA_GET.description: URI for web drive-by hosted files. eg: /test.doc
